Interface ec.e.rep.steward.SimpleRepository

public interface SimpleRepository
A SimpleRepository knows how to retrieve simple objects locally. An object is simple if it does not need any support at decode time such as a perimeter object table or decoding properties table.

An attempt to access potentially non-simple objects through this interface may throw a RepositoryNeedParameterException (a subclass of RuntimeException).

A request for a record with a key that cannot be found will throw a RepositoryKeyNotFoundException, also a subclass of RuntimeException.

get(Object)

get 
 public abstract Object get(Object key) throws IOException
